text.text_translated: Earthquakes can damage all structures, including bridges. These collapses are rare, especially for modern bridges. This is because they are built to be stronger. Engineers have learned to design bridges in earthquake zones on ground that is much more resistant to movement. This helps the bridges stay safe when the ground shakes.
